description: A boy in a snowy field moves to hold a fox; a gentle horse looks on.
A boy stands in the snow, cradling a fox in his arms, near a sitting spherical creature. A gentle white horse rests close by.
A boy kneels in snow facing a large white horse, with a small fox also present looking at the horse.
A boy stands near a winged white horse and fox by water. Trees surround, and snow covers the ground.
